nfo.data

Class Output

  • java.lang.Object
    • nfo.data.Output

  • public abstract class Output
extends java.lang.Object
    Manage the messages printed by the program, can print on the standard output or in a file. All the message are stored THEN printed when all the argument of the command line interface has been parsed.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Rio Alexandre
